keys.title: Keys
keys.subtitle: Manage your PGP key pairs
keys.emptyDescription: PGP keys enable end-to-end encryption for secure communication. Generate a new key pair or import existing keys to start encrypting messages, signing files, and verifying authenticity.
keys.whatCanDoEncrypt: Send messages only the intended recipient can read.
keys.whatCanDoSign: Prove that a file or message truly came from you.
keys.whatCanDoVerify: Confirm the authenticity of signed content from others.
keys.whatCanDoSecureEmail: Use PGP/MIME or inline encryption with any email client.
keys.howKeysWorkDescription: Each key pair consists of a public key you share with others and a private key you keep secret. Others encrypt messages with your public key that only your private key can decrypt. Always back up your private key and protect it with a strong passphrase.

info.title: Info
info.subtitle: Learn about Kript and its features
info.whatIsKriptDescription: Kript is an open-source PGP encryption tool that runs entirely in your browser. It allows you to generate cryptographic keys, encrypt and decrypt messages, and sign and verify data â€” all without any data ever leaving your device.
info.featureKeys: Generate and manage PGP key pairs using Curve25519 or RSA algorithms.
info.featureEncrypt: Encrypt messages or files using a recipient's public key.
info.featureDecrypt: Decrypt messages or files using your private key.
info.featureSign: Create digital signatures to prove authenticity.
info.featureVerify: Verify digital signatures against a public key.
info.privacyDescription: All cryptographic operations are performed locally in your browser using the Web Crypto API and OpenPGP.js. Your keys and data are stored in your browser's IndexedDB and never transmitted to any server. Kript works offline once loaded.
info.openSourceDescription: Kript is fully open source. You can audit the code, report issues, or contribute on

home.title: Kript - Secure Local PGP Encryption
home.description: Open-source PGP encryption tool that runs entirely in your browser. Generate keys, encrypt messages, sign documents. No data ever leaves your device.

encrypt.title: Encrypt Messages and Files - Kript
encrypt.description: Securely encrypt messages and files with PGP encryption. Use public keys or passwords. Completely local, no data sent to servers.

decrypt.title: Decrypt PGP Messages - Kript
decrypt.description: Securely decrypt PGP encrypted messages and files. Automatic signature verification. All operations performed locally.

sign.title: Digital Signatures - Kript
sign.description: Create PGP digital signatures for messages and files. Prove the authenticity of your documents. Inline or detached signatures.

verify.title: Verify PGP Signatures - Kript
verify.description: Verify the authenticity of PGP signed messages and files. Supports inline and detached signatures.

settings.title: Settings - Kript
settings.description: Configure Kript preferences. Manage algorithms, key expiration, and output settings.

info.title: About - Kript
info.description: Learn about Kript, the PGP encryption tool that runs in your browser. Privacy, security, and features.
